About the Company: Hindustan Tin Works Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing and trading of tin/metal containers & tin sheets.The company also provides flexible packaging solutions which are being used extensively for all major FMCG, Food & Non-Food packed products. The company`s product range includes Printed Sheet,Cans and Components,For Processed Food (OTS) Flattened & Built Up Cans,Ring, Lid Tagger Assembly and Bottoms,Double Tight(DT) Ring, Lid & Bottoms,Single Tight Ring with DT Lid and Bottom,Single Tight Ring With Lever Lid and Bottom,etc..The company also in the business activities of Trading.
